summary: An undercover Nazi in Libya aims to steal fuel and deliver it to a specific location in the desert where an Italian bomber would refuel on its way to Allied target.
cast: Horst Buchholz|Sylva Koscina|William Berger|Riccardo Garrone|Howard Ross|Giuseppe Castellano|Carlo Gaddi|Andrea Scotti|Giancarlo Bastianoni|Carlo De Mejo|Vincenzo Maggio
title: Las ratas de la violencia
